授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to learn about and practice for the TOEIC test. In order to register for this course, students must meet minimum level requirements as set by the Language Centre.
到達目標:
Students will be able to target an approximate score of 600 or higher.
Students will be able to choose statements that best describe a picture.
Students will be able to understand appropriate responses for simple everyday spoken questions and statements.
特記事項: この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。
